item.title: Primer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Aside from the musings on mindlevelup, I’ll periodically churn out much larger, more researched essays that are accompanied by illustrative graphics. The images all have a consistent flat style; they’re adorably designed to entice you to read the hefty, multi-thousand word essay within. Planning 101: Habits 101: Attractor Theory: The Ancient God Who Rules High ... Read more

item.title: Death: Reality vs Reported
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Data collection and analysis by Hasan Al-Jamaly, Maximillian Siemers, Owen Shen, and Nicole Stone. Background: How do people die? How do people think we die? And is there a difference? Well, it turns out there’s a fascinating study conducted by Paul Slovic and Barbara Combs where they looked at how often different types of deaths were mentioned in the news. They then compared ... Read more
